paragraphs: The literal translation of this text is "And the Scrolls have foretold, of black wings in the cold, that when brothers wage war come unfurled, Alduin bane of kings, ancient shadow unbound, with a hunger to swallow the world."
Ahrk fin Kel lost prodah, do ved viing ko fin krah, tol fod zeymah win kein meyz fundein.
Alduin, feyn do jun, kruziik vokun staadnau, voth aan bahlok wah diivon fin lein.
